Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants members or officers of the state police credit for service as a deputy sheriff, county corrections officer, or state corrections officer
Summary: Grants members or officers of the state police credit for service as a deputy sheriff, county corrections officer, or state corrections officer; two years credit; cost borne by member.
LawCode: Amd ยง381-b, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to granting members or officers of the state police credit for service as a deputy sheriff, county corrections officer, or state corrections officer
